A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too many plot holes. Way too many useless scenes that don't add to the storyline. Probably the 3rd worst Star Wars ever. When they had no story they just wrote in a one liners to make up for it. Terrible script\, bad use of characters\, Finn is still useless. It's garbage wrapped up with two great characters Kylo and Rey which did an awesome job considering the lack of direction in the movie.
